data.title: Delicious burger
data.text: After passing by and seeing this place last time i was in Downey, i knew i was going to have a burger next time i was in town. Well i was not disapointed!.. walking in the place was a little too cold a/c was crancked on high. But outside patio was perfect. My girlfriend had the BCG and i had the Cali. Both were very tasty. Burgers always taste better with a cold beer, and yes they have that too. Love this place ill be back.

data.title: Can't beat Burger City for hamburgers  and fries.
data.text: Burger City Grill is not your ordinary hamburger, fast food joint. It is located in the Downey (CA) Gateway at the Southwest corner of Firestone Blvd. and Downey Ave. directly across from Portos Cuban Cafe. You must maketo sure to have a very juicy hamburger on their thick buns. the fries are very delicious! The soda drink dispenser machine, I believe, can make maybe 80 different kinds. This is a very different and excellent restaurant specializing in hamburgers.

data.title: Burger City Grill
data.text:
Let me start out with craft beers 50% off Monday through Wednesday.  The beers are served in plastic cups,  but for under $3/pint it's a great deal. 
The burgers are delicious and cooked to order making them fresh and tasty. 
There is an outdoor patio with a few tables and outdoor flame heaters. 
Nice establishment with a couple of televisions and a fancy soda fountain offering many different flavors.

data.title: Burgers and brews
data.text: Awesome cheese burger. Great choices of sodas and ipa beers on tap.  The fries are not to share they are that good

data.title: Great Not Cheap Burgers
data.text: Great burgers, great service, not cheap for burgers, but worth it. They have beer as well.  go get some ice cream next door afterwards.

data.title: great burger
data.text:
Very fresh and tastes homemade!  Very friendly and helpful staff.
Great buns and fries.  Timely on service and reasonable.

data.title: Great Burgers and Craft Beers
data.text: Small selection of burgers, but whats available are great tasting. Made with top quality Angus meat (turkey and veggie patty for substitution) and fresh vegetable ingredients on a brioche bun. The hand cut potatoes fries can easily feed two. But the best part for me was pairing it all up with a great craft beer on draft. Also a great place to watch a sporting event on their many flat screens TVs. Plenty of tables indoors and outdoors too.
